modules.title: Foundations of Servers & Networking
modules.summary: Build a mental model of how the internet works, understanding client-server architecture and HTTP basics.

modules.title: IP Addresses, Ports & NAT
modules.summary: Understand network identification, why servers aren't reachable by default, and how NAT works.

modules.title: Local Servers & Hosting Basics
modules.summary: Learn to run servers correctly on your machine, distinguishing between localhost and 0.0.0.0.

modules.title: Exposing a Local Machine Publicly
modules.summary: Master port forwarding and understand the risks and mechanics of public exposure.

modules.title: Domain Names & DNS
modules.summary: Control how humans reach your servers using DNS records, TTL, and local simulations.

modules.title: Reverse Proxies & Web Servers
modules.summary: Serve multiple services safely using reverse proxies like Nginx to hide internal ports.

modules.title: HTTPS, TLS & Certificates
modules.summary: Secure data in transit with encryption, understanding TLS, certificates, and CAs.

modules.title: Server Security Fundamentals
modules.summary: Defend against common attacks like port scanning using firewalls and best practices.

modules.title: Advanced Server Hardening
modules.summary: Lock down your server with SSH keys, Fail2Ban, and least privilege principles.

modules.title: Monitoring, Logs & Maintenance
modules.summary: Keep track of server health with resource monitoring and log analysis.

modules.title: Backups, Recovery & Incident Response
modules.summary: Prepare for the worst with backup strategies and incident response plans.

modules.title: Production Practices & Expert Concepts
modules.summary: Adopt expert mindsets for scaling, zero-downtime deployments, and infrastructure as code.
